name: Bird Strike: Redux
description:
Also available on the Google Play Store: Bird Strike: Redux

2D side-scrolling arcade game. Collect coins while evading an onslaught of hostile birds. Use accumulated coins to buy missiles. 

New bonuses and effects, plus a global leaderboard! Spend coins to customize your profile: you can now choose a name, rank, and squadron for your player. The world's single-round highest score can now be viewed in-app on the Global Leaderboard (Main Menu, to Stats & Info). 

Also featuring a new soundtrack with songs by DaveH, Dizaro, Ikson, MusicbyAden, and Ethan Sturock.

Left-click or tap the screen to give your chopper lift. Tap to the right of the chopper to move it forward in the screen, or to the left of the chopper to move it backward. Swipe to fire missiles. 

To trade coins for profile upgrades, go to the Stats Menu from the Main Menu. If you have collected enough coins, a button offering a promotion, name change, or squadron change will appear at the bottom of the screen.

Latest version 3.0, released January 8, 2022
